name: Zombie FPS Game (Lastra)
description:
A FPS game I developed some time ago, it has 7 basic enemies, 2 unique bosses, 2 playable levels and 12 different guns. You have to survive 10 rounds to be able to fight the boss and win the game, each round is harder than the one before. 
The game was made with UE4 and it was solo developed BUT it uses some third party assets from the asset store and sketchfab, please check the out on the credits menu.
